DOC.brief_summary: Objectives To evaluate effect increase vitamin D intake vitamin D status , bone mass bone turnover young girl age 12-13 . More specifically effect follow parameter assess : - Vitamin D metabolites . - Parathyroid hormone . - Bone turnover . - Bone mineral accretion . - Serum calcium phosphate . - Renal handling calcium phosphate .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Vitamin D Bone Accretion Turn-Over Young Girls
DOC.detailed_description: This work package consist randomise double blind one-year vitamin D supplementation study . Primary effect parameter change bone mineral content therefore study duration one year . A total 225 subject , 75 three group : one control two intervention group , include Two dosage supplementation use : 5 µg per day 10 µg per day .
